markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Catfolk Pouncer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=71)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Catfolk pouncers travel the world in search of new experiences.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Catfolk_CatfolkPouncer.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Catfolk Pouncer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=71)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 54</row>

**Perception** +6; low-light vision

**Languages**
[Amurrun](/Languages.aspx?ID=25), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10) (3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 19

**Cat’s Luck** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76)) **Trigger** The catfolk pouncer fails or critically fails a Reflex saving throw. **Frequency** Once per day. **Effect** Reroll that saving throw and take the better result.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
greataxe +8 ([Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d12+3 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Sudden Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The catfolk pouncer Strides up to double their Speed. If the catfolk ends their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-20" />
name: Catfolk Pouncer

text: Catfolk Pouncer Catfolk pouncers travel the world in search of new experiences. Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 15 Unspecific Lore : DC 13 Specific Lore : DC 10 Catfolk Pouncer Source Bestiary pg. 54 Perception +6; low-light vision Languages Amurrun, Common Skills Acrobatics +7, Athletics +6, Nature +4, Stealth +7, Survival +4 Str +3 Dex +4 Con +1 Int -1 Wis +1 Cha +1 Items Leather Armor, Spear (3) --- AC 17 Fort +6 Ref +9 Will +4 HP 19 Cat’s Luck Reaction (fortune) Trigger The catfolk pouncer fails or critically fails a Reflex saving throw. Frequency Once per day. Effect Reroll that saving throw and take the better result. --- Speed 30 feet Melee Single Action greataxe +8 (Sweep), Damage 1d12+3 slashing Melee Single Action dagger +9 (Agile, Finesse, versatile S), Damage 1d4+3 piercing Ranged Single Action dagger +9 (Agile, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 1d4+3 piercing Sudden Charge Two Actions The catfolk pouncer Strides up to double their Speed. If the catfolk ends their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy.
